stories.description: As a user, I want to log in to Sauce Demo so that I can access the product catalog and shopping features.
stories.acceptanceCriteria:
Given I am on the Sauce Demo login page
When I enter valid credentials (standard_user / secret_sauce)
And I click the Login button
Then I should see the Products page
And the page title should be 'Products'

stories.description: As a customer, I want to add products to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple items together.
stories.acceptanceCriteria:
Given I am logged in to Sauce Demo
When I click 'Add to cart' for Sauce Labs Backpack
And I click 'Add to cart' for Sauce Labs Bike Light
Then the shopping cart badge should show '2'
And both products should appear in the cart

stories.description: As a customer, I want to complete the checkout process so that I can purchase my selected items.
stories.acceptanceCriteria:
Given I have items in my shopping cart
When I proceed to checkout
And I enter shipping information (First: John, Last: Doe, Zip: 12345)
And I continue to the overview page
And I click the Finish button
Then I should see the order confirmation
And the confirmation message should say 'Thank you for your order!'

stories.description: As a system, I want to prevent unauthorized access by rejecting invalid credentials.
stories.acceptanceCriteria:
Given I am on the Sauce Demo login page
When I enter invalid credentials (invalid_user / wrong_password)
And I click the Login button
Then I should see an error message
And the error message should contain 'Username and password do not match'

stories.description: As a customer, I want to remove products from my cart so that I can adjust my order before checkout.
stories.acceptanceCriteria:
Given I have added Sauce Labs Backpack to my cart
When I navigate to the shopping cart
And I click the Remove button for the Backpack
Then the product should be removed from the cart
And the cart badge should update to show '0'

stories.description: As a customer, I want to complete the entire shopping flow from login to order confirmation.
stories.acceptanceCriteria:
Scenario: Complete shopping flow
Given I am on the login page
When I login with valid credentials
And I add 2 products to cart
And I proceed to checkout
And I complete the shipping information
And I confirm the order
Then I should see the order confirmation page
And the confirmation header should say 'Thank you for your order!'
